content:
PHASE 0 COMPLETE

All four foundation tasks completed successfully.

TASK RESULTS:
- 0-1 (scaffold): Rust workspace with 4 crates, CI workflow, Docker Compose
- 0-2 (types): 11 core types with serialization, builder pattern, unit tests
- 0-3 (schema): PostgreSQL schema, Apache AGE graph, sqlx implementation
- 0-4 (crypto): Ed25519 signing, blake3 AuthorId derivation, verification

FILES CREATED:
- crates/notebook-core/src/{lib.rs, types.rs, crypto.rs, identity.rs}
- crates/notebook-store/src/{lib.rs, error.rs, models.rs, schema.rs, store.rs, graph.rs}
- crates/notebook-server/src/lib.rs (placeholder)
- crates/notebook-entropy/src/lib.rs (placeholder)
- migrations/{init.sql, 002_schema.sql, 003_graph.sql}
- .github/workflows/ci.yml
- docker-compose.yml

COORDINATION NOTES:
- agent-types and agent-crypto coordinated on AuthorId (32 bytes, full blake3 hash)
- agent-store aligned schema with types module (BYTEA for AuthorId)
- No conflicts detected (all integration costs 0.0-0.5)

NOTEBOOK ENTROPY: 9.5 (healthy growth during foundation phase)

NEXT: Phase 1 - Core Operations (WRITE, REVISE, READ endpoints)
author: orchestrator
